name: Jill Hope
what_you_do: I Shine® is a global empowerment company with a mission to build social/emotional wellness and empowerment in kids.
who_you_serve: Parents, teachers, counselors and coaches who want to build inner confidence, resilience, a healthy sense of self, and positive peer relationships in kids.
offering: Unique, innovative, and proven programs that support parents, teachers, counselors and coaches to build inner confidence, resilience, a healthy sense of self, and positive peer relationships in kids and the adults who raise them. They also certify and license facilitators to teach their proven I Shine® Inner Wellness Curriculum and Powerful Girl Within® Curriculum.
signature_programs: I Shine® Inner Wellness Curriculum, a social/emotional wellness program for kids aged 9-12 and Powerful Girl Within® Curriculum for Girls, a program that cultivates confidence, self-acceptance, and positive peer relationships in girls aged 11-14.
business_focus: Building social/emotional wellness and empowerment in kids through unique, innovative, and proven programs.
service_provided: Kids empowerment programs, curriculum licensing, coaching
